name: Draining Kiss
description: You attempt to zap the target's energy with a kiss. Make a melee attack roll on a creature, dealing 1d8 + MOVE fairy damage on a hit. The user is then healed for half the damage dealt.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
